basics.summary: Hello, World!  My name is Byungchan Park, who dreams of becoming a blockchain developer. If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.- Albert Einstein This is why I started this blog. Let's do it. _Like the beginning, now, always and forever!_ :)
